Entry.de-DE: Diplomatie auf die eine oder andere Weise

The guards rush into the garden, surrounding the hapless serving {G0:girl:boy}. It doesn't take long to find out the truth, that {G0:she:he} is an assassin sent by {CHARACTER-1} to lure you to your death.
It seems that your quick thinking has saved you on this occassion, but what will you do with the knowledge of {CHARACTER-SHORT-1}'s plans?
